Yonkers.Blackledge-Gair House: The Blackledge-Gair House at 111 Madison Avenue between Brookside Avenue and Waverly Place in Cresskill, New Jersey is one of the Early Stone Houses of Bergen County, New Jersey, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places, where its period of significance was given as 1800-1849. In 1861 it was listed as the residence of J.P. Blackledge, and in 1876 as that of Robert Gair.
